resources.string: Experience Christmas in an ecologic and sustainable way, reduce carbon emissions, and ease traffic; use the ViaggiaRovereto App to plan your trips and explore some new and smart itineraries.
Take me to the Christmas Markets
Take me back to the \"Stadio Quercia\" Parking

A shuttle bus is available from the \"Stadio Quercia\" Parking to Piazza Rosmini (and vice versa) every Saturday between the 6th and the 27th of December, plus every day between the 20th and 24th of December.

If you ride the shuttle bus and compile a survey that you can drop by the info box of the Christmas Markets, you will earn a reward, to be chosen among a gadget, a free entry to to Great Nativity (Grande Presepe) or a ticket to the Christmas train.

This initiative, which is promoted by the \"Rovereto in Centro\" consortium, the municipality of Rovereto, the Rovereto and Vallagarina APT, Fondazione Bruno Kessler, CAIRE Urbanistic, is part of the EU Research Project STREETLIFE, which supports sustainable urban mobility through advances in Information and Communication Technologies.
